pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 6 by SSCI.

content.raw:
Can you fill me in exactly how you were utilizing this model?   Essentially you were not using the `localModel` functionality but you were using a modified `vehicle_topics.launch` and `model.sdf` to get your sensor modality to work?

‌

There are problems with your `spawner.rb` file.  I’m working through some of the discrepancies to figure out how we can improve the documentation to prevent this kind of scenario in the future.
content.html:
Can you fill me in exactly how you were utilizing this model? Essentially you were not using the localModel functionality but you were using a modified vehicle_topics.launch and model.sdf to get your sensor modality to work?

‌

There are problems with your spawner.rb file. I’m working through some of the discrepancies to figure out how we can improve the documentation to prevent this kind of scenario in the future.
